title: TUESDAY - Drew Brees hurting 2020
itunes:title: TUESDAY - Drew Brees hurting 2020
description:
Week 10 wrapping up as the Vikings beat the Bears (0:06), but Chicago suffering a big loss as quarterback Nick Foles left with an injury (0:30). Hear from Bears head coach Matt Nagy (0:44) on the status of his QB. We have the latest on Saints quarterback Drew Brees (1:46) as he's dealing with some broken ribs. We look ahead to Week 11 as there's no love lost when the Chiefs and Raiders get together (2:24), and it's a big-time NFC West matchup (3:23) when the Cardinals and Seahawks face off on Thursday night. Plus, a HUGE guest (4:09) joins the GMFB crew to talk Cardinals football

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
